blog.name: niceprophecies
blog.title: PLEASE do not LICK the WALL

summary:
Anyone else got the impression from all those interviews that Michael Sheen ships them hard?
I mean... I just can’t really...
body:
Anyone else got the impression from all those interviews that Michael Sheen ships them hard?

I mean… I just can’t really believe it (I come from the Sherlock fandom, so you might have heard from the train wreck that was s4) he talks so openly about love and being a married couple and stuff, and he seems so happy about it, always beaming!

As I said, Sherlock gave me trust issues, but when the actor himself says he played it that way… should I get my hopes up?

reblog.comment:
Anyone else got the impression from all those interviews that Michael Sheen ships them hard?

I mean… I just can’t really believe it (I come from the Sherlock fandom, so you might have heard from the train wreck that was s4) he talks so openly about love and being a married couple and stuff, and he seems so happy about it, always beaming!

As I said, Sherlock gave me trust issues, but when the actor himself says he played it that way… should I get my hopes up?

trail.content_raw:
Anyone else got the impression from all those interviews that Michael Sheen ships them hard?

I mean… I just can’t really believe it (I come from the Sherlock fandom, so you might have heard from the train wreck that was s4) he talks so openly about love and being a married couple and stuff, and he seems so happy about it, always beaming!

As I said, Sherlock gave me trust issues, but when the actor himself says he played it that way… should I get my hopes up?
trail.content:
Anyone else got the impression from all those interviews that Michael Sheen ships them hard?

I mean… I just can’t really believe it (I come from the Sherlock fandom, so you might have heard from the train wreck that was s4) he talks so openly about love and being a married couple and stuff, and he seems so happy about it, always beaming!

As I said, Sherlock gave me trust issues, but when the actor himself says he played it that way… should I get my hopes up?

blog.name: wordsintimeandspace
blog.title: I take the words. I scatter them in time and space
blog.description:
Sue, 28, from Germany. Bi/ace/nonbinary. This is mainly a Doctor Who blog (RTD era, Big Finish and Doctor/Rose), with a healthy dose of David Tennant and Billie Piper, and occasionally some stuff from other fandoms. [Pronouns: she or they]

Links:
My fanfic on tumblr and AO3 .
You can also find everything on my fanfiction masterlist. And if you still want to read more, I can recommend my fic rec lists.

Have fun!
